name: Summon Orchid Dove
text: [main-action] [exhaustion] 1[charm-class]: Place an Orchid Dove conjuration onto your battlefield. Focus 1: You may change the activation cost of this spell to [main-action] [exhaustion] 1[basic] Focus 2: You may deal 1 damage to a target player's Phoenixborn if they do not have any cards in their draw pile.
